oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: George Hamilton IV Performance - Tape 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 3 of 7. Multiple recordings of George Hamilton IV (performer) on January 01, January 02, January 03, and January 04, 1957 for the Aruthur Godfrey Show .
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Arthur Godfrey introduces George Hamilton IV for the Arthur Godfrey Show -- (00:12) Movin' On (George Hamilton IV) -- (01:49) Godfrey tells of Hamilton's song writing and Godfrey and Hamilton talk about his recorded record -- (03:00) Godfrey jokes about "Moving On" -- (03:12) A Rose and a Baby Ruth (George Hamilton IV) -- (05:26) Godfrey and Hamilton discuss the popularity of "A Rose and a Baby Ruth" and its writer John D. Loudermilk -- (06:55) Arthur Godfrey introduces George Hamilton IV for the Arthur Godfrey Show -- (07:23) I've Got a Secret (George Hamilton IV) -- (09:53) Godfrey jokes about "I've Got a Secret" and Godfrey and Hamilton discuss "A Rose and a Baby Ruth" -- (10:53) Arthur Godfrey introduces George Hamilton IV for the Arthur Godfrey Show -- (11:09) It Was Me (George Hamilton IV) -- (13:30) Godfrey touches on Hamilton's writing and both Hamilton and Godfrey discuss the WMAL recording group Hamilton worked with -- (14:50) If You Don't Know (George Hamilton IV) -- (17:10) Godfrey talks on Hamilton's writing, talks more about Hamilton's record "A Rose and a Baby Ruth", and inquires about Hamilton's radio show -- (19:04) Arthur Godfrey introduces George Hamilton IV for the Arthur Godfrey Show -- (19:35) Everybody's Body (George Hamilton IV) -- (21:55) Godfrey and Hamilton joke about Hamilton writing "Everybody's Body" the previous night -- (22:37) Godfrey inquires about Hamilton's college schedule -- (23:17) It's My Way (George Hamilton IV) -- (25:22) Everybody's Body (George Hamilton IV) -- (27:54) Everybody's Body (George Hamilton IV) -- (30:24) A Rose and a Baby Ruth (George Hamilton and the Country Gentlemen)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hamilton, George, IV, 1937-;
